description: This file defines the 'OrdersPage' widget in a Flutter app, responsible for displaying a list of user orders with details such as order ID, date, status, and items. It includes UI elements like headers, list views, and expansion tiles to show order details.

classes.name: OrdersPage
classes.description: A Flutter widget that displays a list of user's orders, either showing a message if no orders exist or a detailed list with expandable order details.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the OrdersPage, including headers, conditional message or list of orders.
